column4: thanks, is it ok just to keep posting my origonal question every halfd hour or so?
does anyone know if there is a way to initiate a full web install from a current disk? the disk is corrupt, but still boots... Thanks in advance!
umm, you could, but you'd have to bypass the standard installer, go advanced, and spend much of the time in the console between steps.  Be MUCH easier to just use a CD
